They get along surprisingly well for two nations who used to wage war on each other.
I like them. They'd get along well with my class, I think. You see that maid on the left? She has so much in common with Mikan!

scene.name: Scene 10
scene.directive: I think you get the idea.

scene.name: Scene 11
scene.directive: So here's the thing.
I wanted to come to your world, but I couldn't find anything on it!
You're a total ghost!

scene.name: Scene 12
scene.directive: So I was thinking...
Since I can't find anything from your world...
If you wanted to... make some good memories right here...
I'd be willing.

scene.name: Scene 13
scene.directive: You and Mahiru undress. At Mahiru's request, you put on a condom as well.

scene.name: Scene 14
scene.directive: Ah... I'm enjoying this, ~name~. Are you?
I'm not super experienced, but you... can go faster if you want...

scene.name: Scene 15
scene.directive: Ah! You're... not too shabby.
So! Keep going... Please...

scene.name: Scene 16
scene.directive: It feels so good!
D-Dammit! I'm so close now! Don't stop, ~name~!

scene.name: Scene 17
scene.directive: AHHHHH!

scene.name: Scene 18
scene.directive: The hell was that?
Did you seriously finish before me?
I telegraphed I was getting close and everything!
Geez...

scene.name: Scene 19
scene.directive: Still, it was a fun time.
You're better than I gave you credit for. Sorry 'bout that.

scene.name: Scene 20
scene.directive: Wait, hold on. I was so caught up in the moment, I forgot to get a picture, didn't I?
Whoops.

scene.name: Scene 21
scene.directive: I know it's blasphemous for the Ultimate Photographer to be saying this...
But I hope you'll carry today with you always, photo or not.
'Kay?
